Package Main_Menu_class

Class Main_Menu

java.lang.Object
Main_Menu_class.Main_Menu
public final class Main_Menu extends Object
This is a static class that is never instantiated. It controls the main logic for running the program, through user input that creates the 2 Player objects, selects the games to run, and when to exit the program. Also has helper methods to format output into boxes made from Asterisks.
Author:
Jonathan Wayne Edwards on Monday 8 May 2023

    • mainMenuLoop

      public static int mainMenuLoop()
      THE MAIN LOOP FOR THE WHOLE PROGRAM
      Returns:

    • secretSeed

    • mainMenu

      public static void mainMenu()
      The Main Menu. Pick a game. Pick the score to win it. Display winning game message. Quit? If yes, display the final win totals, declare a winner, and exit the program.

    • makeRandomName

      private static String makeRandomName()
      Returns:
      String that is a random name from a list of 52 names: 26 Boy names, 26 Girl names, one name each per letter of the alphabet. Got from https://babynames.net, and my own mind.

    • makeAsterisks

      public static String makeAsterisks(int numAstr)
      A private helper method to help create boxes of asterisks. Also called by other classes. This method simply returns a String containing the desired number of asterisks.
      Parameters:
      numAstr - int number of asterisks to return in the return String
      Returns:
      String containing numAstr asterisks.

    • makeAsterisksCenter

      public static String makeAsterisksCenter(int totalAstr, int numCenter)
      A private helper method to help create boxes of asterisks. Also called by other classes. This method returns a String containing a row of asterisks to be placed to either side of a String in a line, to center the string within the line within the whole rectangular asterisk box. TODO Add ability to accept the string itself, then output BOTH left and right asterisk Strings as an array of type String[], to accommodate Strings with an ODD NUMBER of characters.
      Parameters:
      totalAstr - int total astrisks in each line of the asterisk block
      numCenter - int number of spaces to allow for in the middle of this line.
      Returns:
      String containing the proper number of asterisks on each side of the String in the middle of this line with numCenter charaters in it.

    • makeSpaces

      public static String makeSpaces(int numSpaces)
      Simply returns a string containing numSpaces space characters.
      Parameters:
      numSpaces - int number of spaces to fill the return String with.
      Returns:
      String with numSpaces space characters in it.
